column2: the food. The menu is short and to the point. My boyfriend and I stick to the ribs
column4: and chicken. All amazing (though the chicken can be dry sometimes). The fresh-cut fries are my personal favorite of any fries ever in the history of fries. The mac and cheese is a close runner up. When I'm in a healthy mood
column6: but it's not my favorite. (I think they use marinated sun-dried tomatoes on it
column7: and I can't get into the flavor.)
